movies.title: The Lost City of Z
movies.plot: A true-life drama in the 1920s, centering on British explorer Col. Percy Fawcett, who discovered evidence of a previously unknown, advanced civilization in the Amazon and disappeared whilst searching for it.

events.title: Percy Fawcett is riduculed at the Royal Geographical Society
Percy Fawcett announces what is to be his last expedition
Percy Fawcett sends his last letter to his wife

movies.title: Mark Felt: The Man Who Brought Down the White House
movies.plot: The story of Mark Felt, who under the name "Deep Throat" helped journalists Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the Watergate scandal in 1974.
